name: Catch it 2
description: Catch 2 now has changed ! before we have only the one normal mode catch and go to other levels by avoiding  bombs ,but now we have one other mode and the old mode too ! the new mode called Catch run it`s a many levels you need to complete with your player like platform games run and win with 20 different levels to complete more levels and new things will come with updates in the near future .
